Class Bank

java.lang.Object
  Bank

public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object

Bank class holds any number of BankAccount objects. COMP 1451 lab 3 -- there are a number of deliberate bugs in the project.

Version:
July 2007
Author:
Colleen Penrowley
